name: places/ChIJm_Zxl-pYwokRdlqEOmYqJE0
adrFormatAddress: 1260 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

editorialSummary.text: Upscale retail store selling Parisian-inspired clothing, shoes & accessories for babies & children.

originalText.text: The staff at this location is so much nicer that UWS. Come here! A small and cute store. I love the reservation function online with a pickup option, which is very convenient, so you can get what you want in the sizes you need.

text.text: The staff at this location is so much nicer that UWS. Come here! A small and cute store. I love the reservation function online with a pickup option, which is very convenient, so you can get what you want in the sizes you need.

originalText.text:
I had a most pleasant experience today as I was buying some clothes
for my granddaughter who is 3 weeks old. They suggested I took a bigger size as Jacadi has a tendency to make smaller clothes and they were right My grand-daughter is bigger than most kids ans it was a good suggestion.
Many thanks again, Sabine Farber

originalText.text: Very cute children’s clothing.   We are having a little girl and I’m sure we will be shopping here quite a bit.

text.text: Very cute children’s clothing.   We are having a little girl and I’m sure we will be shopping here quite a bit.

originalText.text:
I don't know which Friench Movie/Dream you are living in, but you need to do a REALITY CHECK real quick, as your head is waaayy up in the clouds!
This last Saturday I visited the store in order to exchange the gift I got from a friend, as it was a bit small in size and for summer time.
I was greeted very nicely (that's why it is one star and not ZERO), but as soon as I asked for a credit store gift card (my spouse is nursing at home our newborn, and can't go for a casual shopping spontaneously, that's why the store credit) in exchange for the purchase - I immediately got a firm reject from the representative!
Something like: you need to exchange it right here and right now, no other option - choose some other clothes, that's it!
Maybe in France it will fly by, but you opened a brunch in NYC, America - FYI! If there's no option to get a gift certificate in exchange for the clothes we got as a present (Notice: I didn't asked for money!) than you guys are daydreaming!
Long story short - I ended up exchanging and re- purchasing the same clothes I came in with, just to get additional 30 days for my fashionable wife to be able to get to the store, and purchase something.

originalText.text: Well that was my first time going bbq's at 72 street, I'll say the bbq's at Bay plaza is better. The food was good but I order bacon and melted cheese for my bake potatoes and they bring me 4 bacon not even cut and shredded cheese now what I'm suppose to do with that smh. I taste the bacon and I'm being honest it tasted old like it was there all day. And the cornbread wasn't even fresh it tasted old as well.
